amendatorysection.catchline: Minor traffic violations; pretrial diversion program; eligibility.
amendatorysection.para: Any driver holding a commercial driver's license or CLP-commercial learner's permit issued pursuant to the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act shall not be eligible to participate in a program under sections 29-3605 to 29-3609 if such participation would be in noncompliance with federal law or regulation and subject the state to possible loss of federal funds.

crossreference.para: Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act, see section 60-462.
